NPCs

B

Emily Ballard

The Venatori proctor of the Student Dormitories in Everlight Venatori Compound.

L1 Helpful Venatori who Manages the Dormitories
HP 7, damage 4
loot: 2 inexpensive items

Dora Bess

Therian owner of The Corner Bistro and Grandmother (mother´s mother) to #Gregory Lin.

L3 Flippant Therian who Cooks a Mean Meal
HP 8, damage 7
loot: Artifact/Oddity

John Bowers

The leader of the Venatori in Everlight

L9 Inquisitive Venatori who Runs the Venatori

disposition: Disdain
loot: 6 inexpensive items

D

Draven Darkstar

aka Loren Blackwood and The Crimson Seraph

Draven Darkstar is the lead singer for Eternal Eclipse. He is a very old embraced vampire who was once a human trained venatori hunter. He hunts Venatori now with the same passion he once hunted vampires with. Loren is currently the owner of the Vampiric Snare.

L9 Angsty Vampire who murders and sings
HP 31, damage 10
loot: Artifact/Oddity Vampiric Snare

Issac Dreamweaver

aka Morgan Sheridan

Issac Dreamweaver is the drummer for Eternal Eclipse, he is an Alpha Therian without a pack.

Morgan Sheridan is brother to Adrian Sheridan in Alpha of the Lone Wolf Pack in New York City.

L5 Alpha Therian who plays the drums
HP 18, damage 9
loot: 3 inexpensive items

E

Salvatore Einor

One of the first Vampires embraced and member of the Vampire Council, founder of Everlight.

L10 Elder Vampire who Runs the Sanquine Masquerade
HP 43, damage 11
loot: 5 moderate items

Ryan Elliot

The Hound's Chevalier.

L7 Helpful Warrior who Guides the Hound
HP 20, damage 10
loot: 5 moderate items

Jason "Jace" Emerson

Nox's former roommate in the academy and bully during that time frame. Jace is currently in Everlight and Nox is his new roommate. He kicked Nox out of the room after he stepped between him and a vampire.

L5 Jealous Venator who Looks for Trouble
HP 28, damage 7
loot: 4 moderate items

Kai Emerson

Nox's father. Jace's father. Heir to the Emerson family line on the Venatori Council.

L10 Seductive Venatori who Conspires with Venatori Leadership
HP 34, damage 13
loot: Artifact/Oddity

G

Alexander "Xander" Gerard

See Alex Kennedy

Elinor Gerard

Heir to the Gerard line of the Venatori Council. Alex's mother. Jace's mother.

HP 37, damage 13
loot: 2 inexpensive items

K

Thomas Kennedy

aka Aiden Shadowcaster

S

Damien Nox Sétanta

See Nox Sétanta

Leeann Sétanta

A Venatori raised human who was attacked by werewolves when she was younger. Nox's mother. Leeann's family were non-practicing Sussuri of the Gemini Coven.

L5 Strict Mother who Slays Monsters
HP 32, damage 9
loot: Six Cyphers

Seth Rider Sétanta

Leeann's son, Nox's twin brother.

L5 Outgoing Therian who Doesn't Know he can Wolf out
HP 14, damage 6
loot: Six Cyphers
